title: SET_USE_HI_DOF
content:
0xA13B0222F3D94A940x8BBF2950// SetUseHiDof
void SET_USE_HI_DOF();Needs to be called every tick to make the active camera use a high depth of field.\
The DoF can be customized using SET_CAM_NEAR_DOF, SET_CAM_FAR_DOF, SET_CAM_USE_SHALLOW_DOF_MODE, SET_CAM_DOF_STRENGTH and other DoF related natives.Usage ExampleA usage example for this native can be found in the following native documentation: SET_CAM_DOF_STRENGTH.
